## How to test
### Plugin
- [ ] Plugin activates without errors
- [ ] CPT visible (Campaigns)
- [ ] Shortcode form works: `[naritive_create_campaign]`
- [ ] REST endpoint works: `/wp-json/naritive/v1/campaigns`

### Dashboard
- [ ] `.env` configured (VITE_API_BASE_URL)
- [ ] Search works (client name)
- [ ] Status filter works
- [ ] Pagination triggers server fetch
- [ ] Loading / error / empty states behave
